page.title: 14KNOCKDARA HOUSE
page.content: {KNOCKDARA} means{HILL OF THE OAKS}in{ {GAELIC.The house stands in a small estate off{CHAPEL ROAD.}There are two mysteries linked with{KNOCKDARA HOUSE. It was built as a police station.One night the cook and the sergeant argued over the meal.The cook had left his knife on the newel.The cook pushed the sergeant down the stairs and his head was cut off by the knife.To this day can still be heard the sergeant holding a knife and looking for his head. The next mystery concerns a man who came home late.Being drunk he had an argument with his wife .He lifted a carving knife and lunged it into his wife's throat. You can still hear the woman's screams. The house was knocked down in 1982 but the legend still remains.
